data.current_description: Retrieve all messages, using query parameters to specify the information that gets returned.

Original summary has a typo ('and and') and is less precise. Description lacks clarity about the upsert logic, return format, and HTTP status codes. Added details about unique property matching, individual operation outcomes, and batch response structure with status codes to improve AI agent understanding of operation behavior and error handling.

data.current_summary: Create and and update a batch of messages
data.current_description: Create and update a batch of messages by a unique property. Messages that don't exist will be created, while existing messages will be updated.
data.summary_suggestion: Upsert a batch of communications by unique property
data.description_suggestion: Create or update a batch of communications using a unique property identifier. For each communication in the batch: if a matching unique property value exists, the communication will be updated; if no match exists, a new communication will be created. Returns a batch response indicating success or failure status for each communication, with HTTP 207 indicating partial success when some operations fail.
data.reasoning: Original summary has a typo ('and and') and is less precise. Description lacks clarity about the upsert logic, return format, and HTTP status codes. Added details about unique property matching, individual operation outcomes, and batch response structure with status codes to improve AI agent understanding of operation behavior and error handling.

data.current_description: Delete a message by ID. You can restore deleted messages within 90 days of deletion. Learn more about [restoring activity records](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/records/restore-deleted-activity-in-a-record).

data.current_description: Update a batch of messages by ID (`communicationId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.description_suggestion: Update a batch of communication records by ID (`communicationId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Property values can be cleared by passing an empty string. Returns a batch response with updated records and error details for failed updates.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about batch response format and partial success handling. Added information about return value structure and error handling for better AI agent understanding of what to expect from the operation.
